comment.author: 29528454@N04
comment._content: This is really quite humorous and with no malice intended. The law of physics would eject these pumpkins with a few shakes of the cow's head. I do not recall sending out Halloween greetings.

comment.author: 92068436@N00
comment._content: are you saying the pumpkins were placed on the cows head? It looks to me like the woman came over to the cow to milk it and found something frightful as a prank. the pumpkins are just decor for the scene. you think?
